select seq_vacation.currval from dual
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLASSDATE WHERE LEC_NO IN (SELECT LEC_NO FROM MYCLASS WHERE m_no = #{m_no}) AND CLASSDATE= #{classdate} -- vacation date로 바꾸기
select v.*, m.name from vacation v , member m where m.m_no = v.m_no order by v.v_no desc
select v.*, m.name from vacation v , member m where v_no=#{v_no} and v.m_no = m.m_no
select v.* ,title ,name from vacation v , lecture l, member m where v.lec_no = l.lec_no and v.m_no = m.m_no and l.m_no= #{m_no} and tstatus='N' order by l.lec_no desc

select mc.lec_no,cd.classdate from myclass mc, classdate cd where m_no=#{m_no} and mc.lec_no=cd.lec_no --1번학생이 수강중인 수업날짜들 and cd.classdate in (select vacation_date from vacationdate where m_no=#{m_no})
